Text:
The government is a little bitch for not acknowledging this. The only government that has openly came out about the validity of the usefulness of this stuff is New Zealand. Might I remind you that its also one of the hardest countries in the world to become a citizen if not native because you need a skill they require.

On the other hand, if you have money, America will accept you regardless of what you are, just as long as you don't forget to bring the money...
